segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at this ridiculous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading onto the floor, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and the boy is balancing like a little acrobat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the girl is just standing there, patiently waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to collapse, but he’s so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like something out of a comedy sketch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how much longer the woman will stay in her own little world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the calm garden outside and the chaos inside is just perfect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone walks in soon to see this madness.
segments.speaker: PAR
